table.title: Top SRC IP by Failed Auth

search.query: `index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ | fields user src dest http_user_agent status | stats count(eval(status=407)) as AuthReq, count as TotalReq, dc(user) AS "#Users", dc(dest) AS #dest, dc(http_user_agent) AS #user_agent by src | eval FailedReq%=round(AuthReq/TotalReq*100) | search FailedReq% > 30 |sort - FailedReq%,TotalReq | head 100

`index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ | fields user src dest http_user_agent status | stats count(eval(status=407)) as AuthReq, count as TotalReq, dc(src) AS "#IPs", dc(user) AS "#Users", dc(dest) AS #dest by http_user_agent | eval FailedReq%=round(AuthReq/TotalReq*100) | search FailedReq% > 30|sort - FailedReq%,TotalReq | head 100

`index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ user!="-" user!="*$" | fields user src dest http_user_agent status | stats dc(src) AS #src, values(src) AS src, dc(http_user_agent) AS #user_agent by user | search #src > 1 |sort -#src | head 100

table.title: Multiple Usernames coming from a single IP

search.query: `index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ user!="-" user!="*$" | fields user src dest http_user_agent status | stats dc(user) AS #user, values(user) AS user, dc(http_user_agent) AS #user_agent by src | search #user > 1 | sort -#user| head 100

`index_and_sourcetype` $user$ $src$ $dest$ $http_user_agent$ $action$ authentication_method=* | fields user src dest http_user_agent status authentication_method | stats count, dc(user) AS #user, values(user) AS user, dc(http_user_agent) AS #user_agent, dc(src) AS #src by authentication_method | sort -count
